short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChromeOS Kiosk. Autostart any URL in Kiosk mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Autostart any URL as ChromeOS Kiosk at Power-on. 

E.g. ChromBit for Digital-Signage. 

Hint: 
Before the very first login, ChromeBit must be enabled to run "Kiosk-mode" by pressing "Alt-Cntrl-K" when prompted to Login.
To "reset" a previous login, a "Powerwash" is required. 

All settings may be done in "chrome://extensions" 
check "developer-mode"
